title: Listener Numbers, Contacts, Similar Podcasts - Balance En Ayurveda
description: See how many listeners and other statistics. View social follower numbers, contact emails, reviews and podcasts like Balance En Ayurveda.
text:
Si te interesa aprender nuevas formas de como cuidar de tu cuerpo, mente y alma de forma integral y balanceada, entonces este podcast es para tí. Acompañame a mí, Laura Luján a explorar el maravilloso mundo de la Ayurveda donde estaremos hablando del origen y principios de esta antigua ciencia, de los 5 elementos y de cómo benefician o afectan nuestro día a día, del arte de vivir a través de los hábitos diarios mediante un profundo análisis y entendimiento del cuerpo, mente y consciencia, y finalmente de cómo todo esto es el fundamento de la salud y la felicidad.
Do you want to know how many people listen to Balance En Ayurveda? Or perhaps how many downloads it gets?
[Rephonic](/) has scanned the web and collated all the information we found in our podcast database.
Listen to the audio and view podcast download numbers, contact information, listener demographics and more to help you make better decisions about which podcasts to sponsor or be a guest on.
Our
[search tool](/search/topics) lets you find other similar podcasts that cover the same topic and allows you to compare the figures, so you can be informed when reaching out.
Cuando se habla de nutrición en Ayurveda no se mencionan los macro y micronutrientes o las famosas calorías. No se cuentan números ni gramos de carbohidratos, proteínas, grasas, sino que se tiene una visión más orgánica, natural e integral de la alim... more
Agni en sánscrito quiere decir fuego. En el ámbito de la Ayurveda, al hablar del Agni nos estamos refiriendo al elemento que permite que los alimentos ingeridos se transformen en los nutrientes que nuestro cuerpo necesita para desarrollar sus funcion... more
Según la Ayurveda existen 6 sabores básicos a partir de los cuales se agrupan todos los alimentos. Sabor o rasa en sánscrito, es la base fundamental de la dieta y los tratamientos ayurvédicos, ya que el equilibrio de los doshas llega a restablecerse ... more
Rephonic provides a wide range of data for two million podcasts so you can understand how popular each one is. See how many people listen to Balance En Ayurveda and access YouTube viewership numbers, download stats, chart rankings, ratings and more.
Simply
[upgrade your account](/start) and use these figures to decide if the show is worth pitching as a guest or sponsor.
There are two ways to find viewership numbers for podcasts on YouTube. First, you can search for the show on the channel and if it has an account, scroll through the videos to see how many views it gets per episode.
Rephonic also pulls the total number of views for each podcast we find a YouTube account for. You can access these figures by
[upgrading your account](/start) and looking at a show's social media section.
Podcast streaming numbers or 'plays' are notoriously tricky to find. Fortunately, Rephonic provides estimated listener figures for Balance En Ayurveda and two million other podcasts in our database.
To check these stats and get a feel for the show's audience size, you'll need to
[upgrade your account](/start).
To see how many followers or subscribers Balance En Ayurveda has, simply
[upgrade your account](/start). You'll find a whole host of extra information to help you decide whether appearing as a sponsor or guest on this podcast is right for you or your business.
If it's not, use the
[search tool](/search/topics) to find other podcasts with subscriber numbers that match what you're looking for.
Rephonic provides a full set of
[podcast information](/product/podcast-outreach-database) for two million podcasts, including the number of listeners. You can see some of this data for free. But you will need to [upgrade your account](/start) to access premium data.
Balance En Ayurveda launched 2 years ago and published 12 episodes to date. You can find more information about this podcast including rankings, audience demographics and engagement in our
[podcast database](/product/podcast-outreach-database).
Our systems regularly scour the web to find email addresses and social media links for this podcast. But in the unlikely event that you can't find what you're looking for, our
[concierge service](https://rephonic.com/blog/podcast-contacts) lets you request our research team to source better contact information for you.
Our systems scan a variety of public sources including the podcast's official website, RSS feed, and email databases to provide you with a trustworthy source of podcast contact information. We also have our own research team on-hand to manually find email addresses if you can't find exactly what you're looking for.
Rephonic pulls reviews for Balance En Ayurveda from multiple sources, including Apple Podcasts, Castbox, Podcast Addict and more.
View all the reviews in one place instead of visiting each platform individually and use this information to decide whether this podcast is worth pitching as a guest or sponsor.
You can view podcasts similar to Balance En Ayurveda by exploring Rephonic's 3D interactive graph. This tool uses the data displayed on the 'Listeners Also Subscribed To' section of Apple Podcasts to visualise connections between shows.
